turns.user_message: Hey, I'm looking to schedule a doctor visit for a health concern I've been putting off. [INNER_THOUGHTS] It's time to take care of this now and not procrastinate anymore.
turns.assistant_message: Hey Samir! It's great that you're ready to take care of your health. Do you have a specific type of specialist in mind?
No worries, take your time! If you're unsure, I can help suggest some common specialists. What health concerns are you thinking about?

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: I appreciate the encouragement, but I haven't really thought about which specialist to see yet. I just want to get this done.

turns.assistant_message: I understand it can be tough to decide. How about we start with general health check-ups? That way, you can address any concerns. What do you think?

user_profile.name: Samir Al-Hassan
user_profile.description: Samir is a 60-year-old Middle Eastern man with intermediate tech skills. He approaches life with an analytical mindset but tends to make decisions impulsively, which has led him to seek out a doctor visit for a nagging health concern he has been putting off. His casual communication style and moderate expressiveness allow him to comfortably share his thoughts, and with extensive experience in navigating medical systems, he feels adaptable in scheduling appointments whenever necessary.

additional_requirements: Access to patient reviews for doctors
Option for virtual consultations if needed
